revised_title: Researches on Vanadium: Part III - Preliminary Notice
tldr: This article investigates the properties and reactions of vanadium, focusing on its metallic form and various compounds. The author explores vanadium's absorption of hydrogen, its interaction with bromine, and the formation of different vanadium oxides and salts. The article also discusses the classification of vanadium salts and the preparation of new vanadium compounds.
